name: Echoes of The Forgotten
description:
In the moment this is just a prototype to add in my portfolio to show my Development Skill.

But i'll try to make it worth of your time.

The game is going to consist in explore and help the Forgotten Souls to find the light.

(I'm not a good artist so the biggest part of assets is from other people, inlcuding people here on itch.io)
